title: QR code scanner is overlapped with white background when switching between tabs
body:
# Problem
White screen is overlapping camera, it is visible on iPhone 7 and less visible on Androids i have (7 and 8)

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/28752642/57229291-60fc7b80-701e-11e9-804d-91a89527cd6d.png)

## Steps


1. open camera on chat tab (add contact -> scan code)
1. open camera on profile tab (mailserver -> add new -> scan code)
1. open camera on wallet tab (send -> scan qr)
1. switch between 3 tabs
best solution would be to make QR scanner as modal (according to @flexsurfer )
@asemiankevich please, open a separate issue for crash issue

> @asemiankevich please, open a separate issue for crash issue

https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/8167

Issue Status: 1. **Open** 2. Started 3. Submitted 4. Done

Add your own contribution [here](https://gitcoin.co/issue/status-im/status-react/8139/2969). * Questions? Checkout Gitcoin Help or the Gitcoin Slack * $97,423.79 more funded OSS Work available on the [Gitcoin Issue Explorer](https://gitcoin.co/explorer)
